description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，粟裕大将之子。曾任中国人民解放军陆军第六十七集团军参谋长、第二十四集团军军长、北京军区副司令员等职。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, and the son of General Su Yu. He served as Chief of Staff of the 67th Group Army, Commander of the 24th Group Army, and Deputy Commander of the Beijing Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军主要领导人之一，中华人民共和国十大将之首。粟戎生之父。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the People's Liberation Army, ranked first among the Ten Grand Marshals of the People's Republic of China. Father of Su Rongsheng.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所中学，粟戎生于1961年于此毕业。
description.en: A secondary school in Beijing, China, from which Su Rongsheng graduated in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾经存在的一所高等军事院校，粟戎生于60年代后期于此毕业。
description.en: A former higher military institution of the People's Liberation Army, from which Su Rongsheng graduated in the late 1960s.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第六十七集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第六十七集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的一个集团军，粟戎生曾于1985年起担任其参谋长。
description.en: A former group army of the People's Liberation Army, where Su Rongsheng served as its chief of staff starting in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 中越边境冲突中的一场重要战役，粟戎生曾以陆军第六十七集团军参谋长身份参与。
description.en: An important battle in the Sino-Vietnamese border conflicts, in which Su Rongsheng participated as the Chief of Staff of the 67th Group Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第二十四集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第二十四集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的一个集团军，粟戎生曾担任其军长。
description.en: A former group army of the People's Liberation Army, where Su Rongsheng served as its commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的七个大军区之一，粟戎生曾担任其副司令员。
description.en: One of the seven former military regions of the People's Liberation Army, where Su Rongsheng served as its deputy commander.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一种高级军衔，粟戎生于1999年被授予此军衔。
description.en: A high rank in the People's Liberation Army, awarded to Su Rongsheng in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 指1979年2月17日－1979年3月16日中国、越南两国在中越边境爆发的战争。广义上是指从1979年到1989年近十年间的中越边境军事冲突。
description.en: Refers to the war that broke out on the Sino-Vietnamese border between China and Vietnam from February 17, 1979, to March 16, 1979. In a broader sense, it refers to the Sino-Vietnamese border military conflicts that lasted for nearly a decade from 1979 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 对越自卫反击战期间，陆军第六十七集团军一项针对211高地的反攻计划。该计划的失败引发了对粟戎生指挥能力的争议。
description.en: A counter-attack plan by the 67th Group Army targeting Hill 211 during the Sino-Vietnamese War. The failure of this plan led to controversy over Su Rongsheng's command abilities.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省下辖的地级市，粟戎生的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province, China, and the birthplace of Su Rongsheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省怀化市下辖的县，粟戎生的籍贯地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Huaihua City, Hunan Province, China, and the ancestral home of Su Rongsheng.

description.zh-cn: 粟戎生是粟裕的儿子。
description.en: Su Rongsheng is the son of Su Yu.

description.zh-cn: 粟戎生于1942年出生于江苏扬州。
description.en: Su Rongsheng was born in Yangzhou, Jiangsu in 1942.

description.zh-cn: 粟戎生的籍贯地是湖南会同。
description.en: Su Rongsheng's ancestral home is Huitong, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 1961年从北京101中学毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Beijing 101 Middle School in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 60年代后期毕业于哈尔滨军事工程学院导弹控制专业。
description.en: Graduated from Harbin Military Engineering Institute with a major in Missile Control in the late 1960s.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第六十七集团军

description.zh-cn: 1985年，升任陆军第六十七集团军参谋长。
description.en: In 1985, he was promoted to Chief of Staff of the 67th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 以陆军第六十七集团军参谋长的身份参加两山战役。
description.en: Participated in the Battle of Laoshan and Zheyin as the Chief of Staff of the 67th Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第二十四集团军

description.zh-cn: 曾担任陆军第二十四集团军军长。
description.en: Served as the Commander of the 24th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 曾担任北京军区副司令员。
description.en: Served as the Deputy Commander of the Beijing Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，被授予中国人民解放军中将军衔。
description.en: In 1999, he was awarded the rank of Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 有文章指，粟戎生应该对在“M1”计划中211高地反攻失败负主要指挥失利的责任，此争议影响了其声誉。
description.en: Some articles allege that Su Rongsheng should bear primary responsibility for the command failure in the unsuccessful counter-attack on Hill 211 under the 'M1' plan, a controversy that affected his reputation.
